oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greetings from Nashville, Tenn., circa 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Tennessee State Capitol and Tennessee State Office Building, along with the Nashville Municipal Auditorium. The Nashville Municipal Auditorium was the primary indoor sports and concert venue in Nashville from the time of its completion in 1962 until the completion of the Nashville Arena (now Sommet Center) in 1996. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville Municipal Auditorium (Tenn.); Tennessee State Office Building (Nashville)
